verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w traveled|strong="H5265"\w* \w on|strong="H5676"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* near \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w across|strong="H5676"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorites,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w terrified|strong="H3966"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w dreaded|strong="H1481"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* said \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w horde|strong="H6951"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* devour \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w us|strong="H5439"\w*, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H4428"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w licks|strong="H3897"\w* \w up|strong="H3897"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grass|strong="H3418"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.” \w Since|strong="H6258"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*,

\w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Pethor|strong="H6604"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w* \f + \fr 22:5 \ft Hebrew the River\f* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,” \w said|strong="H7121"\w* Balak. “\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*. \w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3201"\w* \w be|strong="H3201"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w defeat|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w cursed|strong="H1288"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* fees \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w They|strong="H1697"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* relayed \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*.

“\w Spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*,” \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*.

Then \w God|strong="H4310"\w* came \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w and|strong="H1109"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* these men \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* said \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H7971"\w* message:

‘\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* land. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*. Perhaps \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w may|strong="H3201"\w* \w be|strong="H3201"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w*.’”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, “Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*’s \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* homeland, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w returned|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* said, “\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H1980"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w distinguished|strong="H3513"\w* \w than|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* first messengers.

\w They|strong="H3541"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* nothing \w hinder|strong="H4513"\w* \w you|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w coming|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w richly|strong="H3966"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* say. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*!’”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, “If \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1571"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w overnight|strong="H3915"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* others \w did|strong="H4100"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w find|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w else|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.”

\w That|strong="H1697"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* God \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “Since \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*, \w get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* must only \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* donkey, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. The Angel and Balaam’s Donkey

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*’s anger \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* Balaam \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 22:22 \ft Or Angel; here through the rest of chapter 22; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized.\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* oppose \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. Balaam \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* donkey, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* donkey \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, she \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w off|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* return \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w narrow|strong="H4934"\w* passage between \w two|strong="H2088"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w walls|strong="H1447"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w either|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* donkey \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pressed|strong="H3905"\w* herself \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, crushing \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*’s \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*. \w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w once|strong="H3254"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.
